title: vidudalai vidudalai
sahitya:
viDudalai viDudalai viDudalai
1 paraiyarukku ingu tIyar pulaiyarukkum viDudalai paravarODu kuravarukku maravarukkum viDudalai
tiramai koNDa tImaiyaTra tozhil purindu yAvarum tErnda kalvi jnAnameidi vAzhvaminda nATTilE

2  Ezhai enrum aDimai enrum evanumillai jAtiyil izhivu koNDa manidarenbad-indiyAvil illaiyE
vAzhi kalvi shelvameidi manamagizhndu kUDiyE manidar yArumorunigar samAnamAga vAzhgavE

3  mAdar tammai izhivu sheyyu-maDamaiyaik-koLuttuvOm vaiya vAzhvu tannilenda vaghaiyilum namakkuLE
tAtarenra nilaimai mAri ANgaLODu peNgaLum sari nigar samAnamAga vAzhminda nATTilE
